metadata.Title: CVE-2009-4494 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: AOLserver 4.5.1 writes data to a log file without sanitizing non-printable characters, which might allow remote attackers to modify a window's title, or possibly execute arbitrary commands or overwrite files, via an HTTP request containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

notes.Note: jdstrand> if there is a problem, it is the terminal that has the issue

criterions.comment: aolserver4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
